# The hash extension

This extension provides HASH message digest framework and is always enabled in
PHP.

## Configuration options

### PHP_EXT_HASH_MHASH

:orange_circle: *Deprecated as of PHP 8.1.*

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enables the mhash emulation support.
